Articles.Content:
Just found a blog post about a planet orbiting Alpha Centauri B, thought it might interest some here. It was posted yesterday and looks legit. May be posting in the wrong section but not sure...

http://blogs.discovermagazine.com/badastronomy/2012/10/16/alpha-centauri-has-a-planet/
Already made a post about this a little while ago http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/24236-Earth-sized-planet-found-orbiting-Alpha-Centauri-B
dammit, beat me to it. No worries, so long as people see it doesn't matter who put it up.
